title: Slow cooker paprika beef and gnocchi
ingredients: ['225g lean beef', '1 onion, chopped', '1 clove garlic, chopped', '1/2 teaspoon paprika', '1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 tin tomatoes', '100ml stock or water', '1/2 tablespoon sugar (preferably brown)', '1/2 tablespoon tomato puree', '200g fresh gnocchi']
